<[silence:3600]>

The word universe derives from Old French univers <[silence:250]> meaning "the whole world" <[silence:1200]>
which itself stems from Latin universum—a contraction of unus "one" <[silence:250]> and versus "turned" <[silence:250]> implying "all things turned into one." <[silence:3600]>

Three related concepts are cosmos <[silence:250]> multiverse <[silence:250]> and existence. <[silence:3600]>
